summary: A prison warden, with a nasty habit of killing escapees, has teen twin daughters claiming to be pregnant. Their boyfriends marry them. The husbands' only way out of hell is to rob the money train.
cast: Marlon Brando|Donald Sutherland|Charlie Sheen|Thomas Haden Church|Mira Sorvino|Martin Sheen|David Arquette|Jean Pierre Bergeron|Rémy Girard|Roc LaFortune|Roy Dupuis|Christin Watson|Holly Watson|James Hyndman|Frank Fontaine|Tom Rack|Pierrette Robitaille|Robert Burns|Gordon Masten|Alain Goulem|Robin Leach|Sylvie Potvin|Tamar Kozlov|Dorothée Berryman|Marie Tifo|Kent McQuaid|Jeff Roop|Art Kitching|Matthew Boylan|Sylvain Beauchamps|Robert Norman|Emidio Michetti|Joseph Brutsman|Pierre Powers|Cynthia Frazier|Candice Frazier|Pierre Couillard|Chantal Lonergan|Maggie Shuter
keywords: father in law son in law relationship|cattle prod|interrupted sex|judge|escape from prison
title: Asalta como puedas
